user_query: I'm organizing a business trip to Dubai and I need to know the current exchange rate for USD to AED. Can you recommend some high-end hotels in Downtown Dubai? Additionally, provide me with the latest news about the Emirati dirham.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current exchange rate for USD to AED.
Retrieve a list of high-end hotels in Downtown Dubai.
Fetch the latest news about the Emirati dirham.
